tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE songs (
    song_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    song_title VARCHAR(255),
    artist_name VARCHAR(255),
    album_name VARCHAR(255),
    release_year INT,
    lyrics TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE songs (
    song_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    artist VARCHAR(255),
    album VARCHAR(255),
    release_date DATE,
    lyrics TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE albums (
    album_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    album_title VARCHAR(255),
    artist VARCHAR(255),
    release_date DATE,
    genre VARCHAR(50)
);
CREATE TABLE Songs ( song_id INT PRIMARY KEY, song_title VARCHAR(100), artist_name VARCHAR(100), album_name VARCHAR(100), release_year INT );
CREATE TABLE Lyrics ( song_id INT PRIMARY KEY, lyrics_text TEXT );
CREATE TABLE Genres ( genre_id INT PRIMARY KEY, genre_name VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE Playlists ( playlist_id INT PRIMARY KEY, playlist_name VARCHAR(100), created_date DATE );

CREATE TABLE Songs (
    song_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    song_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    artist VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    album VARCHAR(255),
    release_year INT,
    genre VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Ratings (
    rating_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    song_id INT REFERENCES Songs(song_id),
    user_id INT,
    rating_score INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Comments (
    comment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    song_id INT REFERENCES Songs(song_id),
    user_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
